description: A very light chilled soup that is as smooth as it is well balanced.
keywords: Cold soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Chilled Pea & Avocado Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium avocado, peeled and diced (save half for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot to a medium heat with the butter. Cook the peas for 1 minutes until cooked. Remove from the heat and set to one side.
Add the vegetable stock to a blender with 1 of the avocados and the cooked peas. Blend until smooth.
